attributes.action: Ask the Parliament to vote against the European communities repeal bill
attributes.additional_details:
Sign this petition and contact your MP to let them know you want them to vote against it.
Sign this petition only if you are a British Citizen in the UK or living abroad.
attributes.background: MPs must vote in order for Britain to leave the EU.A new bill to repeal the 1972 European Communities Act that took Britain into the EU must now be passed by parliament in November.There is no force whatsoever in the referendum result. MPs must vote before Brexit can happen
